Key Match Events: Kerry Carpenter pounded a rare hanging slider from Clase into the Progressive Field seats in right field
Jose Ramirez went hitless with two strikeouts
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland will need a lot more from their lineup if they want to at least get back to Cleveland
Baseball's playoffs are a crapshoot so I refuse to get worked up over a bad result against the best pitcher of 2024 and one of the top two hitters against RHP this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals beat the Yankees so every division series is now tied 1-1
No other division series has Tarik Skubal looming in a potential game 5...
